name: Gettin' Old
description:
Gettin' Old - You got old.
Your name is Eugene Strongarms, a well known knight, where in search of the great fountain of youth, found himself locked up in a dungeon by a sexy evil witch. Now you are cursed and are running out of time. You're gettin' old, but also, getting young? Battle your way out of the dungeon before your time runs out.

GameDev.tv Community Jam submission June 2019 (time)
by adsigua and KYP

edit: sources for v0.2 will be uploaded on a later date
